tool_description: Facial Authentication over API! Use our ML model to identify faces!
name: BioID
title: BioID

api_list.name: Check User
api_list.description: Validate a user's photo among the uploaded photos on your application. Supports PNG's and JPG's.

api_list.name: Add User Photo
api_list.description: Adds a user photo to your application. PNG's and JPG's are supported.
